<h3 id="X31834">X(31834) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: EHRMANN-MID AND EHRMANN-SIDE</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*(2*(b^2+c^2)*a^6-2*(3*b^4+b^2*c^2+3*c^4)*a^4+(b^2+c^2)*(6*b^4-5*b^2*c^2+6*c^4)*a^2-(b^2-c^2)^2*(b^2+2*c^2)*(2*b^2+c^2))  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31834) = 5*X(5)-3*X(568) = 7*X(5)-5*X(3567) = 11*X(5)-9*X(5640) = 3*X(5)-X(5889) = X(5)-3*X(11459) = 5*X(5)-7*X(15056) = 3*X(5)-2*X(16881) = 11*X(568)-15*X(5640) = 9*X(568)-5*X(5889) = X(568)-5*X(11459) = 3*X(568)-7*X(15056) = 9*X(568)-10*X(16881) = 3*X(568)+5*X(18436) = 15*X(3567)-7*X(5889) = 15*X(3567)-14*X(16881) = 5*X(3567)+7*X(18436) = 3*X(5562)-X(6101) = 5*X(5562)-X(10625) = 7*X(5562)+X(11381) = 3*X(5562)+X(12162) = 27*X(5640)-11*X(5889) = 3*X(5640)-11*X(11459) = 9*X(5640)+11*X(18436) = 3*X(5876)+X(6101) = 5*X(5876)+X(10625) = 7*X(5876)-X(11381) = 3*X(5876)-X(12162) = 5*X(6101)-3*X(10625) = 7*X(6101)+3*X(11381) = 7*X(10625)+5*X(11381) = 3*X(10625)+5*X(12162) = 3*X(11381)-7*X(12162)</b>
<p>X(31834) lies on these lines:
{3,9544}, {5,568}, {23,12307}, {30,5562}, {51,12811}, {52,3850}, {140,9729}, {143,5066}, {185,3530}, {323,14130}, {343,13406}, {389,547}, {394,11250}, {399,7512}, {428,12300}, {511,3853}, {542,13470}, {546,1154}, {548,1216}, {549,11444}, {550,12111}, {632,5890}, {1092,10226}, {1658,15068}, {2888,18403}, {2979,15704}, {3060,3858}, {3627,11412}, {3628,5891}, {3845,6243}, {3856,14531}, {3859,10110}, {3861,10263}, {3917,13491}, {5068,13321}, {5133,20424}, {5462,12812}, {5498,11064}, {5901,31751}, {6000,10627}, {6241,8703}, {6759,7555}, {7502,11441}, {7514,12164}, {7575,18350}, {7691,10540}, {7723,12605}, {7999,15712}, {9730,16239}, {10020,10272}, {10024,21230}, {10109,14831}, {10170,12006}, {10539,12107}, {10574,14869}, {10628,16252}, {11562,13392}, {12101,13598}, {12106,17814}, {12279,15686}, {12290,13340}, {12358,16196}, {13348,15690}, {13364,16625}, {14641,15691}, {14892,18874}, {14915,15606}, {15043,15699}, {15052,18378}, {15426,22051}, {17714,18451}, {18356,18531}, {22949,30507}, {28178,31737}, {28186,31738}</p>
<p>
X(31834) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {5, 18436}, {550, 12111}, {3627, 11412}, {5562, 5876}, {6101, 12162}, {15704, 18439}<br>
X(31834) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (52, 3850), (140, 11591), (185, 3530), (389, 14128), (546, 5907), (548, 1216), (5889, 16881), (5901, 31751), (6102, 3628), (10263, 3861), (11562, 13392), (12103, 10627), (13451, 15060), (13630, 11793), (14449, 546), (14831, 10109)<br>
X(31834) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (5, 5889, 16881), (568, 15056, 5), (11459, 18436, 5)<br>
</p>
